code: import React from"react";var Pagination=function Pagination(_ref){var postsPerPage=_ref.postsPerPage,totalPosts=_ref.totalPosts,paginate=_ref.paginate;var pageNumbers=[];for(var i=1;i<=Math.ceil(totalPosts/postsPerPage);i++){pageNumbers.push(i);}return React.createElement("div",{className:"text-center"},React.createElement("nav",null,React.createElement("ul",{className:"pagination justify-content-center"},pageNumbers.map(function(number){return React.createElement("li",{key:number,className:"page-item"},React.createElement("a",{onClick:function onClick(){return paginate(number);},href:"#",className:"page-link"},number));}))));};export default Pagination;
